      • evictFromGlobalCache

        public static void evictFromGlobalCache(KeyableBean bean)
        Evict bean from global cache to force it loads from database. Because the global cache is updated AFTER the bundle is committed, the test that making assertion on the array property of an entity could become ND depending on if the array cache gets updated. Calling this method will make sure that the array is updated.
        Parameters:
        bean - bean to evict from the cache

      • executeSystemServiceTransaction

        com.guidewire.pl.system.exception.TransactionException
